document_data.name: ''Boots of the Mountain King''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Boots of the Mountain King''''' was a variety of [[enchanted]] [[boot]]s around in [[Northwest Faerûn]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Boots of the Mountain King'' were sturdily crafted and looked imposing on the wearer.
document_data.Powers: These boots possessed powerful enchantment that granted the wearer ''[[freedom of movement]]'' and the ability to turn their skin [[Stoneskin|rock-hard]] once per day.
document_data.History: A pair of ''boots of the Mountain King'' belonged to King [[Karagg]] of a small [[fire giant]] community in the [[Mount Hotenow]]'s lava caverns shortly after the {{YearlinkName|1374}}.
